Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: While a few cases of isolated ACTH deficiency have been reported ( OMIM 201400 ) , an inherited POMC defect has not been described so far .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Isolated ACTH deficiency (OMIM 201400) |
| Inherited POMC defect |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Isolated ACTH deficiency (OMIM 201400) |

Note: OMIM (Online Mendelian Inheritance in Man) is a database of genetic and molecular information about human genes and disorders. In this context, OMIM 201400 refers to the specific entry for Isolated ACTH deficiency in the database.
